title: Computer reset and data saved on firefox was erased (bookmarks, passwords, etc). How do I get it back?
content:
I'm using a macbook air, and I was trying to use the fingerprint login thing, when instead of unlocking my puter it shut down the whole thing and it started to make very loud fan noises. I waited a few minutes for it to stop, then got back on, and my bookmarks and saved passwords were deleted from firefox. No passwords or logins were reset on any other applications. This is very alarming since I had just made an email and some accounts to manage some event I'm holding, and now the password I trusted to firefox is lost. I need this password, as otherwise I cannot log into my email since I hadn't time to set up recovery measures (I have tried to recover it, but there's insufficient evidence for google that I own the account :/ ).

I tried looking through my browsing history for anything helpful, but everything was deleted from there as well. I also was not logged into my Mozilla account at the time either, so I am really in some sort of predicament here, , I'd appreciate any advice and ideas here!!
creator: b0nes2852

title: Dublicate Firefox Nightly on Default Apps
content:
Hello guys !!

I just moved from the MS Edge to Firefox Nightly on both on my pc and on my android phone, and as far i like it very much, except maybe the bookmarks sync but i will not talk about this right now.

My problem is on my win11 pc, after the 1st update there are now two identical Firefox apps showing on the default apps, in settings, as you can see in the picture. I search on the internet for a solution but with no success. Can someone help me with this ?? Thanks in advance !!
creator: bephiphop

title: I used to have an exceptions list for cookie autodelete, can't find it
content: Because of cookie autodelete, I have to use 2FA on frequently used sites that I used to have on an exceptions list. I can't find that list anymore.

title: Yahoo Mail cannot run on Firefox version 129.0
content: I always use Firefox as my default browser. In the past, I did not have any problem on getting access to Yahoo Mail such as downloading and deleting the incoming mail. Having upgraded Firefox to its version 129.0 recently, my Yahoo Mail cannot delete the incoming mail after reading. In addition, the counter number of incoming mail remains the same and has no effect. Appreciate it much if any technical assistance will be given soon.
creator: chung.twa

title: Parts of email messages are invisible
content: My email application is zmailcloud.com from Cloudiance. It has worked fine for me for years using Firefox. However, in the last week or so, when I open an email message, I cannot see anything but empty "From"and To" fields. Nothing is in the body of the message, either (see attached screenshot). But, if I open a reply or forward message, everything in the original message appears normal (see other screenshot). This problem does not occur using Micrsoft Edge, only Firefox. Anyone have any suggestions???
creator: howe1

title: Mozilla VPN
content: I have purchased and installed Mozilla VPN on my laptop running Mozilla Firefox. I have set the VPN software to load and start on start up,however Mozilla VPN will not run on start up of my computer nor Mozilla Firefox. I have to start Mozilla VPN manually every time I use Mozilla Firefox.
